VI.i.1.B.2.a
.
Protecting FTI
Agencies or agents that legally receive FTI directly from the Internal Revenue Service, or secondary sources such as the Social Security Administration,
must
have adequate programs in place to protect the data received.
Reference
:Â  For more information on safeguarding FTI, see
M21-1, Part XIV, 4.B
.
title: M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Decision Notices
citation: Part VI, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
